code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var currencySlice=createSlice({name:"value",initialState:{currency:{currency:"USD",symbol:"$"}},reducers:{CurrencyAndSymbol:function CurrencyAndSymbol(state,action){state.currency=action.payload;}}});var CurrencyAndSymbol=currencySlice.actions.CurrencyAndSymbol;export{CurrencyAndSymbol};export var selectCurrency=function selectCurrency(state){return state.currency.currency;};export default currencySlice.reducer;
